about_the_game:
Embark on a chilling journey with "Look Closer!" a horror surveillance game where your task is to monitor haunted locations via live camera feeds. Keep a vigilant eye on the eerie scenes as anomalies manifest before your very eyes. From disappearing objects to shifting shadows and flickering lights, each anomaly challenges your observation skills.

Your role is simple yet crucial: detect these disturbances and report them accurately. Each report will require you to specify the type and location of the anomaly observed. Sounds straightforward, but don't be fooled; you'll need keen eyes and an excellent memory to make it through the night.

Are you ready to take on this spine-tingling challenge? Keep your wits about you—perhaps you'll uncover hidden secrets as you delve into the unknown.

Step into "Look Closer!" and prove you have what it takes to master the art of paranormal surveillance. Will you survive until dawn?



"Look Closer!" now comes with full Twitch integration, enhancing the interaction between streamers and their viewers. Viewers can actively participate in the game by using chat commands to report anomalies directly within the stream. The fastest chatter to report accurately earns points, adding a competitive edge to the viewing experience. At the end of each session, a leaderboard showcases the top contributors, making every game session unique and engaging. Join in and help your favorite streamer navigate the haunted locales of "Look Closer!"—your sharp eyes could lead the way to victory!

Don’t miss out on our exciting trailer that gives you a sneak peek into the thrilling Twitch gameplay features. Check it out now to see the integration in action!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3.50GHz × 4 or better
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: Look Closer! is a single-player horror surveillance game. Monitor haunted locations through cameras, spotting and reporting anomalies like moving objects and sudden intruders. Sharp observation skills are essential to survive the eerie challenges.
